data.answer: Yes, the article provides detailed isotropic and anisotropic temperature factors for the silver complex.

data.answer: 1-methylthymine serves as a model compound to study the interaction of silver(I) with nucleobases, specifically polyuridine.

data.answer: The article focuses on a specific interaction, namely the crystal structure of a 1:1 silver complex with 1-methylthymine.
